ISubsetSelectionStrategy
public interface
ISubsetSelectionStrategy
CardinalSubsetSelectionStrategy
ProportionSubsetSelectionStrategy
SelectAllStrategy

Strategy for selecting a sub-set of items from a superset.

Functions
SelectSubset
int[] SelectSubset(
int supersetCount,
IRandomSource rng
)

Select a subset of items from a superset of a given size.

Parameters
supersetCount
int

The size of the superset to select from.

rng
IRandomSource

Random source.

Returns

An array of indexes that are the selected items.
